title: Top One Trader special
description: Top One Trader, based in the United States and established in September 2023, is a CFD firm offering three program types: Instant, 1 Step, and 2 Steps. The firm supports MT5, cTrader, Match Trader, and TradeLocker platforms. Its public reputation shows a review score of 4.5 out of 5 based on 125 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

challenges.name: Top One Trader - Instant Funding - Instant 200K
Top One Trader - Instant Funding - Instant 100K
Top One Trader - Instant Funding - Instant 5K
Top One Trader - Instant Prime - Instant 100K
Top One Trader - Instant Prime - Instant 50K

forbidden_strategies: News Trading on Funded Accounts (without add-on).
Minimum Hold Time: 5 minutes for profitable trades.
Stop Loss Rule: Must have active SL when entering trade.
Daily Profit Cap (2 Step Plus Funded): 5% of funded starting balance.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: 2% of initial account balance across all programs (Instant Prime).
payout_policy.details: Flash: 80% (90% w/ add-on). Pro: 80% (90% w/ add-on). Instant: starts 60%, scales to 90%. Prime: starts 80%, scales to 100%. Withdrawal Limit: Max $25k net profits per 30 days.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed: Manual copy trading only between your own challenge accounts (1-step, 2-step Pro and 2-step Plus). Prohibited on funded or instant funded accounts.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: EAs are allowed only on 1-step-FLASH, 2-step-Pro and 2-step-Plus challenge accounts, not on funded accounts. Must customize settings.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: 30-day inactivity rule. Must place at least one trade every 30 days.
firm_rules.news_trading: Evaluation: Allowed. Funded/Instant: Prohibited 5 mins before/after high impact news (Violation = profit deduction). Instant Prime allows news trading with add-on.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Temporary restriction on metals leverage (1:3) and weekend holding. Weekends restricted unless add-on purchased.
forbidden_strategies: News Trading on Funded Accounts (without add-on).
Minimum Hold Time: 5 minutes for profitable trades.
Stop Loss Rule: Must have active SL when entering trade.
Daily Profit Cap (2 Step Plus Funded): 5% of funded starting balance.

seo_content:
Top One Trader Technical Infrastructure

Top One Trader, based in the United States and established in September 2023, is a CFD firm offering three program types: Instant, 1 Step, and 2 Steps. The firm supports MT5, cTrader, Match Trader, and TradeLocker platforms. Its public reputation shows a review score of 4.5 out of 5 based on 125 reviews. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
